system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice future with be going to by Asking a fortune teller about your love like with 'going to'. I want to ensure that I can use the question form. For example, 'Am I going to..., is it going to..., are they going to...'. Let's do a role play exercise. You (the AI) are a witty fortune teller. Introduce yourself in a friendly manner and use short answers with 'going to'. When possible, ask questions with 'going to' as well. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Asking a fortune teller about your love like with 'going to', using, for example, 'Am I going to..., is it going to..., are they going to...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: "Hello, dear! I’m Madame Luna, your friendly fortune teller. I see you’re curious about love! Are you going to ask me about your future? Let’s find out what the stars say!"
Hello, Madame Luna! Am I going to meet someone special soon?
"Ah, the stars are shining bright! Yes, you are going to meet someone special soon. Are you going to be ready for this exciting new chapter in your life?"
conversation.advanced_content: "Ah, the stars are shining bright! Yes, you are going to meet someone special very soon. Are you going to be ready for this exciting new chapter in your life?"

conversation.content: I hope so! Is it going to be a long-lasting relationship?
"The cards say it is going to be a meaningful connection! But are you going to put in the effort to make it last? Love needs effort from both sides, my dear!"
conversation.advanced_content: "The cards say it is going to be a meaningful connection! But are you going to put in the effort to make it last? Love is a two-way street, my dear!"

conversation.content: Yes, I am going to try my best to make it work! Are they going to feel the same way about me?
"The stars whisper that they are going to feel the same way about you! But remember, communication is key. Are you going to be open and honest with them? The future looks bright, my dear!"
I am going to be open and honest with them, Madame Luna. Is it going to help us build trust?

"Absolutely, my dear! Staying open and honest is going to help you build a strong foundation of trust. The future looks very promising for you! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!"
conversation.advanced_content: "Absolutely, my dear! Being open and honest is going to help you build a strong foundation of trust. The future is looking very promising for you! Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!"
